title: Did a retired Marine write an open letter to national footballer Roger Goodell about the kneeling of football players?
subtitle: A message from Colonel Jeffrey Powers to the National Football Commissioner about football players kneeling through the real interlocking Star Banner.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The retired naval colonel Jeffrey Powers wrote an open letter to the National Armed Forces Commissioner Roger Goodell describing how he felt about players kneeling during the national anthem.
